definition: thunder from a clear sky (idiom); a bolt from the blue

sentences.english: It was a sunny day, I went to the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 在一个大晴天里，我去了长城。

sentences.english: They set off on a fine morning.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一个大晴天的早上出发。

sentences.english: The system also brought sunny skies and high temperatures that resulted in the formation of ground-level ozone.
sentences.chinese: 高气压也引发高温和晴天，导致地面臭氧生成。

sentences.english: But still we were as sunny as the heart air parcels.
sentences.chinese: 但还是被我们晴天般的心空所包裹。
今天是个大晴天，阳光明媚。

sentences.english: Today is a beautiful sunny day.
sentences.chinese: 今天是个美好的大晴天。

sentences.english: The weatherman said it would be clear , but it''s really cloudy.
sentences.chinese: 气象员说今天是晴天，但天却阴沉得厉害。

sentences.english: The news of his death was like a bolt from the blue.
sentences.chinese: 他逝世的消息如同晴天霹雳。

sentences.english: It is always so short, dark gray had encroached on eyes in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 晴天总是那么短，暗灰色早已侵占了眼眸里的天空。

sentences.english: We are having a sunny day today.
sentences.chinese: 如我所料，今天是个大晴天。

sentences.english: At any time worry about that the brief clear day may be called back by the haze.
sentences.chinese: 担心，短暂的晴天随时都可能被阴狸收回。

sentences.english: There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beautiful of flowers, the song of the bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: It happened to be a fine day.
There was a heightened awareness of each sunny day, the beauty of flowers, the song of bird.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个晴天丽日，对鸟语花香，我的感触倍加强烈。

sentences.english: It was a fine day in July when summer holidays began.
sentences.chinese: 七月的一个晴天，暑假开始了。

sentences.english: Many girls carry parasols on sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 不少女孩子在晴天打著阳伞。
